name: SUPERPUNCH
description:
SUPERPUNCH VR is a punch-your-way-out game for the MAKEITSUPERHOT contest.

Instructions:

Dodge and punch bullets back at enemies. Hit enemies with bullets or your fists to destroy. Survive all the waves, you can't get hit.

This requires an HTC Vive to play, Oculus Rift may work, but was not been tested.

Controls

  • Squeeze grips when punching to move. Your punch, moves you.
  • Time slows when your punch moves you.
  • Menu button to return to Menu
  • Press R to restart the level
  • Escape to quit

This is a prototype and is still in development, it is being released to gather feedback. Contents of game are not representative of final product. The game only has one level.
